Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2017 11:07AM dehalvemaen wrote: I just started radiation on 1/23-had my 5th treatment today. One week down 3 more weeks to go. My left breast feels heavier than the right but otherwise I am doing OK. I am lucky to not be working during treatment as I have tons of sick time. My heart goes out to those of you that have to work and manage treatment at the same time.
Posts.Title: Starting Rads in January 2017 ElizabethAM Caligirl55
